about_the_game: Receive an exclusive in-game assistant, Towelie: Your Gaming Bud. The streets of South Park aren't as safe as they used to be and even the most seasoned South Park veteran will need help. "Towelie: Your Gaming Bud" provides unique assistance to players at key locations throughout the game
detailed_description: Receive an exclusive in-game assistant, Towelie: Your Gaming Bud. The streets of South Park aren't as safe as they used to be and even the most seasoned South Park veteran will need help. "Towelie: Your Gaming Bud" provides unique assistance to players at key locations throughout the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2400 / AMD FX 4320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560Ti / GTX 650 / GTX 750 / GTX 950 / GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 / R9 270 / R9 370 / RX 460
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p @~60FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / GTX 750ti / GTX 960 / GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 280X / R9 380 / RX 470
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p @~60FPS
